# isRemovedOnCompletion

**Instance Property**

Determines if the animation is removed from the target layer’s animations upon completion.

## Declaration

```swift
var isRemovedOnCompletion: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the animation is removed from the target layer’s animations once its active duration has passed. Defaults to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Animation Attributes

- **timingFunction**: An optional timing function defining the pacing of the animation.
